state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant U as User
    participant IC as Image Classifier
    participant CB as Chatbot
    participant DB as Database

    U->>IC: Upload images for Love, Work, Play, Health
    IC->>IC: Classify images
    IC->>DB: Store image classes and categories
    IC->>U: Display classification results
    U->>CB: Initiate conversation
    DB->>CB: Retrieve image classes and categories
    CB->>CB: Generate initial keywords
    loop Refinement
        CB->>U: Ask questions with options
        U->>CB: Provide answers
        CB->>CB: Refine keywords and goals
    end
    CB->>U: Present final identified goal
    CB->>DB: Store user's goal
    loop action plan
        CB ->> U: Provide action planning tools
        U ->> CB: Provide feedbacks and ask further questions
        CB ->> U: Provide answers
    end    
        CB ->> DB: Store current conversation

graph TD
    A[Start] --> B[Initialize LangChain Components]
    B --> C[Load Knowledge Base]
    C --> D[User Input]
    D --> E[Prompt Templates]
    E --> F[Memory Module]
    F --> G[LLM Chain]
    G --> H[Output Parser]
    H --> I[Response Generation]
    I --> J{Continue?}
    J -->|Yes| D
    J -->|No| K[End]

    subgraph LangChain Components
    L[Document Loaders]
    M[Text Splitters]
    N[Embeddings]
    O[Vector Stores]
    P[Prompt Templates]
    Q[Memory]
    R[Chains]
    S[Output Parsers]
    end

    subgraph Prompt Tuning
    T[Few-shot Learning]
    U[Chain of Thought]
    V[Template Optimization]
    end

    style B fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style F fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style G fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style LangChain fill:#f0f0f0,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style Prompt fill:#e6f3ff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px

graph TD
    A[Start] --> B[Load BERT Model]
    B --> C[Initialize LangChain]
    C --> D[Integrate Knowledge Base]
    D --> E[User Input]
    E --> F{Identify Intent}
    F --> |Goal Setting| G1[Goal Setting Template]
    F --> |Action Plan| G2[Action Plan Template]
    F --> |Continuous Checkup| G3[Continuous Checkup Template]
    G1 --> |Mind Mapping| H1[Free Association of Keywords]
    G1 --> |Odyssey Plan| H2[Create 3 Alternative 5-Year Goals]
    G2 --> |Interview| H3[Generate Interview Questions]
    G2 --> |Day Shadowing| H4[Generate Prototype Approaches]
    G3 --> |Daily Logging| H5[Generate Logging Format]
    G3 --> |Summarization| H6[Summarize Likes and Dislikes]
    H1 --> I[Process with LangChain]
    H2 --> I
    H3 --> I
    H4 --> I
    H5 --> I
    H6 --> I
    I --> J[Generate Empathetic and Creative Response]
    J --> K[Update User Context]
    K --> L[Store in Database]
    L --> M{Continue?}
    M --> |Yes| E
    M --> |No| N[End]

    subgraph LangChain Processing
    O[Prompt Template] --> P[Knowledge Base Integration]
    P --> Q[Empathy and Creativity Enhancement]
    Q --> R[Output Generation]
    end

    subgraph Database
    S[(User History)]
    T[(Personalization Data)]
    end

    style C fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style D fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style I fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
    style LangChain fill:#f0f0f0,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style Database fill:#e6f3ff,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
